title: Prime Ministers of India - Complete List from 1947 to 2025
snippet: Dr. Manmohan Singh was the Prime Minister of India before Narendra Modi, serving from 2004 to 2014.

title: List of prime ministers of India - Wikipedia
snippet: The Congress and its United Progressive Alliance (UPA) won the general elections in 2004 and 2009, Manmohan Singh serving as prime minister between 2004 and 2014. snippet: His premiership was followed by Lal Bahadur Shastri's short tenure and Indira Gandhi's 11- and 4-year-long tenures, with both politicians belonging to the Indian National Congress.
